attributes.action: 2021 GCSE exams to be teacher assessed  in order to establish grades.
attributes.additional_details: Students have missed a massive amount of content which they are not going to be able to cover. At the present time schools are working extremely hard to catch up but are failing due to students and staff having to self isolate continually. The impact upon students mental health is a direct result, stress and anxiety a big problem. remote learning used to a vast difference between school. Teachers now need to plan for ongoing accurate assessment of content in order to provide an accurate grade.
attributes.background: Due to the current Covid 19 situation, millions of Year 11 students are not receiving the education which they deserve. Staffing in schools has been affected and classes have been majorly disrupted by staff and children having to follow guidelines and self isolate.
